price: 18. Mpe totiaki kati kati na bango na bamboka oyo topambolaki, bamboka misusu ezali na banzela ya polele ya pene тропа kosala mobembo kati na yango. В osala mobembo butu na moyi na kimia.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا بَيۡنَهُمۡ وَبَيۡنَ ٱلۡقُرَى ٱلَّتِي بَٰرَكۡنَا فِيهَا قُرٗى ظَٰهِرَةٗ وَقَدَّرۡنَا فِيهَا ٱلسَّيۡرَۖ سِيرُواْ فِيهَا لَيَالِيَ وَأَيَّامًا ءَامِنِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā baynahum wabayna al-qurā allatī bāraknā fīhā quran ẓāhiratan waqaddarnā fīhā al-sayra sīrū fīhā layāliya wa-ayyāman āminīna
